Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Folks, behold a classic game from the Golden Age right before your very eyes...'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the street buzzes with excitement as a crowd gathers around a small shop, piquing your curiosity.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Passerby A', 3: "What's going on? If participants can escape the room within a limited time, they receive a generous reward?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Passerby B', 3: "It's a classic play from the Golden Age called... what was it? Escape...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Correct, it's an Escape Room!", 4: '2'}
{3: "The host's voice sounds oddly familiar..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Isn't this my long-lost assistant?", 4: '1'}
{3: "The host beckoning customers at the store's entrance turns out to be Roland."}
{3: 'With confident strides, he approaches you, instinctively taking your hand and guiding you into the shop.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory204.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Quick, the players have gathered, and the game is about to start. Assistant, please play your role well.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland passes you a script with a poker face.'}
{3: 'The header of the first page reads, "Help your opponent escape, but beware of him harming you."'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory595.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can ask further, Roland ushers you into a staff-only secret passage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Once the game starts, I'll be your opponent. Just follow the script's instructions and do your best to help me escape.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'As for the rest of the story... I trust you, my commandant, to improvise brilliantly on the spot.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tight passage meant for one makes every whisper clear, almost like hearing every breath in his words.'}
{2: "Wait, I don't catch any of that.", 3: '36'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Don't fret, it's not a tough script. I found it last minute at the board game shop.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Who knows Constellia still has so many treasures from the Golden Age? Seize this chance to forget your daily troubles and dive in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'How could Iâ€”', 3: '39'}
{3: 'Before you can finish, he flashes a smile and strides forward, turning back to extend his hand toward you.'}
{3: "Reluctantly, you follow the script's directions, doing your best to play along and help Roland escape."}
{3: 'Though unfamiliar with the story, Roland expertly smooths over any slip-ups, barely completing the game with his guidance.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory204.png'}
{3: 'As the game ends and bystanders disperse, only two remain in the empty board game shop.'}
{2: "I think it's time you give me an explanation."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Explanation? Struggling with any game rules?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I meant, why drag me into this?', 3: '53'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "An explanation needed? I think it's crystal clear.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "It's all for seeing you again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "What's with that puzzled look? You doubting me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Gee... how can I prove my unwavering loyalty to you, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'By the way, have you read through the script?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Come to think of it, it does ring a bell.', 3: '60'}
{2: 'Where did I see that...', 3: '61'}
{3: 'Flipping through the script, you spot a handwritten line on the last page.'}
{1: '"Happy Festival, Gray Raven Commandant."', 3: '60'}
